name: Amazing Shrimp Salad
author: XPRESV
summary: This shrimp salad is a great summer treat served with ripe tomatoes or on a bed of spring greens. You will love it!
ingredients: 2 tablespoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®), divided
⅓ cup plain fat-free Greek yogurt
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Layer shrimp evenly on a baking sheet and season with 1 tablespoon seafood seasoning
Bake in the preheated oven until pink, 6 to 10 minutes depending on size
Remove from oven and let cool until safe to handle
Chop shrimp into bite-sized pieces and place into a serving bowl
Add grapes, celery, dill, and chives
Combine mayonnaise, lemon juice, yogurt, and remaining 1 tablespoon seafood seasoning in a separate bowl
Add dressing to shrimp mixture as desired and stir to coat
Store in the refrigerator to cool salad before serving, about 30 minutes
